body:
Thanks Thomas.
The API is pretty complete now but still changes due to evolving Blender  
functionality. I have to do quite a bit to port my scripts to the 2.63  
BMesh version for example. genskyvec.pl works when I simply type the  
command sequence into the windows terminal, it just seems that when  
executing the command sequence with Popen the data from gendaylit is not  
correctly understood by genskyvec.pl. Running simply within Python is a  
good idea, I'll try that.


Ryan












Dr Ryan Southall
Senior Research Fellow
School of Architecture & Design
University of Brighton
